successes.title: Masters Of Anatomy
successes.description: An Anatomy Book drawn by animators, illustrators and comic-book artists who have worked for Disney, Pixar, Dream Works, Marvel and DC.

Pledges.description: DEDICATED SUPPORTER: you want to see this book get published and into a book-store sometime next year. Also, you're a big fan of some or all of the artists involved and you want to show your support!
EARLY BIRD -- SOFT-COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to USA&CANADA ONLY.
CANADA -- SOFT-COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - within CANADA ONLY.
USA -- SOFT-COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to USA ONLY.

EUROPE & MEXICO -- SOFT-COVER --
You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to EUROPE AND MEXICO ONLY.
AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND -- SOFT-COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - within AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND ONLY.
CANADA -- HARD-COVER -- You get one copy of the hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - within CANADA ONLY.
USA -- HARD-COVER -- You get one copy of the hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to USA ONLY.

South America/Asia/ Middle-East -- SOFT-COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to SOUTH AMERICA, ASIA and MIDDLE-EAST ONLY. Tracking available in most but not all countries.
EUROPE & MEXICO -- HARD-COVER -- You get one copy of the hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - EUROPE & MEXICO ONLY.
AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND -- HARD-COVER -- You get one copy of the hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND ONLY.
COMBO - CANADA -- SOFT & HARD COVER-- You get one copy of the softcover and hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - within CANADA ONLY.
COMBO - USA -- SOFT & HARD COVER-- You get one copy of the softcover and hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - within USA ONLY.
COMBO - EUROPE & MEXICO -- SOFT & HARD COVER-- You get one copy of the softcover and hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to EUROPE & MEXICO ONLY.
COMBO - AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND -- SOFT & HARD COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover and hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included - to AUSTRALIA & NEW ZEALAND ONLY.
COMBO - South America/Central America/Asia/ Middle-East/Russia -- SOFT & HARD COVER -- You get one copy of the softcover and hardcover book. Shipping with tracking included.
